hits.name: Amarone della Valpolicella Classico

class.description: Denominazione di Origine Controllata e Garantita

hits.description: Deep ruby red color with garnet shades. Warm, ripe on the nose, intense and of great refinement. The taste is complex, smooth, full bodied, lots of cherry notes and plum.

hits.name: Valpolicella Ripasso (Classico Superiore)
hits.description: Deep ruby red in color. Rich spicy perfumes and black pepper notes with a hint of raisins. Full body balanced taste, very intense and spicy with sweet cherry flavours.

hits.name: Rafal Valpolicella Classico Superiore
hits.description: Intense ruby red in colour, on the nose has dried spices perfumes, with accents of leather and cherry flavours. The taste is fairly intense, spicy with sweet cherry flavours. Well balanced and pleasantly tannic.

hits.name: Valpolicella
hits.description: The color of this wine is bright ruby red, very fresh and fruity at nose, with lots of cherry notes, the taste is fairly intense with sweet cherry flavours.

hits.name: Le Rosse Pinot Grigio
hits.description: Moon yellow color. Clean and spicy perfume, with typical hints of tropical fruit. Medium-bodied taste with a clean, round and soft taste and a crisp finish.
